case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_address_found_1: 20 Miles west of St. George on Gunlock Road
case_circumstances: The decedent's body was discovered by a county road crew as they were clearing a section of the roadside. The decedent had been buried 5 feet from the road and was uncovered by a bulldozer. The decedent could have been buried for months or even years. Richard Triplett with the Washington County Sheriff's Office is the case manager for this case.
case_head_hair: A few strands of fine light blond or gray hair were present.
